column4: First... I have no net connection. <-- stupid newb and I also have no 'sudo' available. I tried to do a recovery and change the /etc/sudoers file, but I could find nothing wrong with it, through what was shown to me on a how-to. Any ideas?
you need to add your user to the admin group, I am not sure why your user is not already...
To do this you are going to have to boot to the live disk or another nix on the same machine, and chroot into the drive and add your user t
